Game.page1:
Select 8 of 16 gravestones in search of ghostly riches!

Find a prize to win instantly or collect Bonus symbols to trigger the bonuses!00Select 8 of 16 gravestones in search of ghostly riches!

Game.page2:
3 {coffinSymbol}{line1complete}Collected triggers the Coffin Capers Bonus.

Select 1 of 2 coffins in each round to capture spirits in the spirit meter.
Collect enough spirits in the meter to win a prize and advance to the next round. Only the prize from the last round completed is awarded.
The bonus ends when the spirits escape without filling the meter, or if the top prize is awarded.03 Collected triggers the Coffin Capers Bonus.

Select 1 of 2 coffins in each round to capture spirits in the spirit meter.
Collect enough spirits in the meter to win a prize and advance to the next round. Only the prize from the last round completed is awarded.
The bonus ends when the spirits escape without filling the meter, or if the top prize is awarded.03 Collected triggers the Coffin Capers Bonus.

Select 1 of 2 coffins in each round to capture spirits in the spirit meter.
Collect enough spirits in the meter to win a prize and advance to the next round. Only the prize from the last round completed is awarded.
The bonus ends when the spirits escape without filling the meter, or if the top prize is awarded.0
Game.page3:
3 {organSymbol}{line1complete}Collected triggers the Organ Donor Bonus.

Select Organ Keys to reveal a cash prize or a multiplier.
Reveal COLLECT to end the Bonus.03 Collected triggers the Organ Donor Bonus.
